publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3916 Donald Gorrie: Children Designing Play Facilities—That the Parliament, while welcoming motion S2M-3890 on the importance of play in the name of Kenneth Macintosh, emphasises the importance of good and imaginative design of children’s play facilities, particularly of involving local children in deciding the facilities to be included in their local playground and their design and management, and encourages councils and other groups planning new or renewed playgrounds to co-operate with local young people, the local community and organisations active in this field.

S2M-3916 Donald Gorrie: Children Designing Play Facilities—That the Parliament, while welcoming motion S2M-3890 on the importance of play in the name of Kenneth Macintosh, emphasises the importance of good and imaginative design of children’s play facilities, particularly of involving local children in deciding the facilities to be included in their local playground and their design and management, and encourages councils and other groups planning new or renewed playgrounds to co-operate with local young people, the local community and organisations active in this field.
S2M-3916 Children Designing Play Facilities (lodged on 2 February 2006) Nora Radcliffe*, Linda Fabiani*

S2M-3916 Children Designing Play Facilities (lodged on 2 February 2006) Euan Robson*, Robin Harper*, Mr Jim Wallace*, Patrick Harvie*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Eleanor Scott*, Jackie Baillie*, Mike Pringle*, John Swinburne*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-3916 Children Designing Play Facilities (lodged on 2 February 2006) Ms Sandra White*, Chris Ballance*, Shiona Baird*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-3916 Children Designing Play Facilities (lodged on 2 February 2006) Frances Curran*
S2M-3916 Children Designing Play Facilities (lodged on 2 February 2006) Mr Jamie Stone*
